page.title: 18The Farm
page.content: At one side there is a house.At the other end is another house. In the middle are animals.They have lots of animals.Cows,dogs,chicken,geese,cats and ducks are some of the animals on the farm.The cows are milked in a parlour.They are milked in the morning and in the evening.They have six dogs. Four of the dogs work on the farm,two do not.They have about 50 chickens,about 90 geese and about 20 cats.They feed themselves.They have about 6 ducks. They have about 500 sheep.The sheep have just been sheared. Zoe likes living on a farm.
